segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me feel a little sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water is spreading across the floor is just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman is just standing there, letting it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s kind of gross how they’re taking advantage of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water is pooling around her feet is just unpleasant to look at.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just clean it up already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels dirty and messy, and it’s making me uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand the thought of the water just sitting there, getting everything wet and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is going to be soaked, and it’s just going to make everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
